page.title: 05PUBS AND VILLAGE HALLS
page.content:
At pubs these days there is quite a lot of entertainment there is usually something for all ages. There are Space Invaders, Fruit Machines and Pinball for the children. There is music which is sometimes live and Pool for the men.
In village halls there are all sorts of things going on. In the evening there is Bingo for old people. There are Games' Nights when you play Snooker, Darts or Table Tennis. Sometimes there are comp@etitions or discos and at Hallowe'en, Bonfire Night anbd Christmas we go and celebrate.
